figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Eligibility criteria. Population, Concepts and Context and types of resources. NUTS, nomenclature of territorial units for statistics.

figure_2.title: Figure 2.
figure_2.caption: Three-step search strategy recommended by the Joanna Briggs Institute (Peters et al40).

claims.sentence:
Eligibility criteria
The inclusion and exclusion criteria will be based on the Population, Concept and Context approach as recommended by the Joanna Briggs Institute (see figure 1).

This period coincides with the Maastricht Treaty, which was concluded in 1992 and entered into force in 1993.Search strategy
Following the Joanna Briggs guidelines for scoping reviews,40 41 a three-step search strategy approach is used for the proposed scoping review, as presented in figure 2.
